path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - Dot Arcade Token and Vesting - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: LinearVesting calculate including clifftime
findings.description: The LinearVesting function calculates vesting amounts including cliff time which may lead to precision issues.

findings.title: Unsafe using transfer method through IERC20 interface
findings.description: Using the transfer method through IERC20 interface can cause issues when transferring tokens and it is recommended to use SafeERC20 library for IERC20 and change all transfer methods to safeTransfer, safeTransferFrom.
